name: Self Reflecting Cube - Gmtkjam2021
description:
This game is my first submission ever to a game jam !

The theme was "joined together", the game was made under 48 hours

The music was made by Abstraction 

(http://www.abstractionmusic.com)

The 2d Assets are modified assets from Kenney Game Assets big pack

(https://kenney.itch.io)

Various sound effects come from freesound.org, more info in the credits menu of the game !
